title: What Was the “Ravenous Bird from the East”?
html:
This metaphor describes Cyrus, who was prophetically destined to humble Babylon swiftly and decisively (see Isaiah 46:11 a ). This is a fitting insertion and serves as a prelude to chapter 47, where Babylon’s destruction is again shown forth.

LDS Church Educational System Old Testament Student Manual, 1 Kings–Malachi, Religion 302, Chapter 16, Item 39
